column18: DAM: Add extra 1d6 at 5th level/ 11th level/ and 17th level.
Gain resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing DMG from weapons.
Extra 1d6 DAM at 5th level/ 11th level/ and 17th level. Can't regain HP.
Create 4 glowing/ hovering objects that shed light out 10 ft. Can move 60 ft.
DAM at 5th level: 2d10/ at 11th level: 3d10/ at 17th level: 4d10.
Advantage on CHA checks to target/ who knows magic used once spell ends.
Create spectral hand that manipulates objects. Can pick up <= 10 lbs.
Mends one break or tear no larger than 1ft. in a mundane object.
Point at target and whisper a message. They can whisper a response.
Create illusory sound or image. Investigation check against spell DC to detect.
DAM increase. 5th level: 2d12/ 11th level: 3d12/ 17th level: 4d12.
Create minor magical effect.  See Sourcebook.
Speed -10ft. DAM increase. 5th level: 2d8/ 11th level: 3d8/ 17th level: 4d8.
Target can't take reactions until next turn. Advantage if target has metal armor.
Next turn you gain advantage on first attack against the target.
Flammable objects ignite.
Charm target so it treats you as friendly. Gets advantage to save if fighting you.
Choose type: acid/ cold/ fire/ lightning/ poison/ or thunder.
Blinds 6d10 HP worth of creatures/ starting with lowest HP.
Know literal meaning of any speech. Understand written words while touching.
Sense presence of magic. Use action to see auras around creatures/objects.
Create illusion to appear as someone else.  Foiled by Investigation vs. spell DC.
You can take Dash as a bonus action until spell ends.
You gain 1d4+4 temp HP.

column10: small feather or piece of down
column18: Targets' descent slows to 60 ft. per round/ takes no DAM/ and can land on feet.
Creates a foggy sphere.  Can be banished by moderate wind.
Target's jump distance tripled until spell ends.
If target isn't wearing armor/ its base AC becomes 13 + DEX modifier.
You choose the target for each dart that does 1d4+1 DAM.
Target also makes CON save. On fail/ poisoned until end of next turn.
Gain +5 bonus to AC/ including triggering attack. Negates Magic Missile attacks.
Create visual-only illusion. Use action to make it move. Investigation to discover.
5d8 total HP of creatures in area fall asleep. Go in order of lowest HP to hightest.
Creatures failing save and objects pushed 10 ft. Boom heard for 300 ft.

column10: twig from tree struck by lightning
column18: Use action to auto hit target hit last round for 1d12 lightning DAM if in range.
Choose one: breathe/swim underwater/ natural weapons/ change appearance
Target becomes blind or deaf (your choice).
Creatures relying on sight have disadvantage to attack.
DAM taken on entering or starting turn in area.
Charm humanoid to attack your target of choice.  Use action to keep control.

column10: bat fur and pitch or coal
column18: Creates darkness normal light can't dispel. Dispels light spells <= 2nd level.
Grants creature darkvision (60 ft.) but can't see in Darkness aura.
Read thoughts of those around you.  See Sourcebook.

column10: fur or feather from a beast
column18: Target creature gains a beneficial effect.  See Sourcebook.
Enlarge or reduce target.  See Sourcebook.
Push targets 15 ft. in directon of wind. Creatures move half speed against wind.
Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn.
Target becomes invisible. Ends if target attacks or casts a spell.
Open mundane lock or suppress an Arcane Lock for 10 minutes. Loud knock.

column10: small leather loop or golden wire
column18: Target <= 500 lbs. floats 20 ft.Can move up/down 20ft./turn. Floats down on end.
Create duplicates that make you harder to hit.  See Sourcebook.
Teleport <= 30 ft. away to unoccupied location.
Affect target with illusion. Can DAM for 1d6 Psychic. See Sourcebook.
Shoot 3 rays at up to 3 targets.

column10: pinch of talc and silver powder
column18: See invisible and ethereal creatures.
Inorganic creatures have disadvantage to save. Objects take DAM too.
Target can walk on walls or ceiling. Climbing speed becomes walking speed.
Target follows reasonable course of action you suggest. Can specify conditions.
Every turn:DEX save or restrain;STR save to escape.Burning webs:2d4 fire DAM.
Roll 11 or higher to go to Ethereal plane between turns; reapper within 10ft.
Create sensor in area you can see or hear through.
Interrupt spell <= 4th. You make casting ability check (DC 10 + spell level).
Creates bright light. Dispels darkness spells <= 3rd level it overlaps with.
End spell <= 3rd level. For >= 4th level/ casting ability check DC=10+spell level.
Targets drop everything and use Dash to run away. WIS save once out of sight.

column10: tiny ball of guano and sulfur
column18: Fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects.
Target gains fly (60 ft.).  Fall if spell ends while in air.

column10: bit of gauze and wisp of smoke

Doubles speed. +2 AC. Advantage on DEX saves. Additional action to Dash.
Creatures charmed/ incapacitated/ speed = 0. Spell ends on DAM or shaking.
Creatures within 10 ft. of initial target also take 2d8 DAM (DEX save for half).

column10: bit of fur and glass rod
column18: Lightning ignites flammable objects.
Create image of object including sounds/ smells. Investigation check to foil.
Creature gains resistance to one of: acid/ cold/ fire/ lightning/ or thunder.

column10: pinch of dust/ drops of water
column18: Difficult terrain.Each turn/DEX save or fall prone/CON save or lose concentration.
Affected creatures become slowed.  See Sourcebook.
Creatures that need to breathe spend turn retching. Wind disperses cloud.
Target understands any spoken language and is understood by everyone else.

column10: short reed or piece of straw
column18: Creatures gain ability to breathe underwater using normal respiration.
Creaturess walk on liquid/ rise 60 ft. per round if under. Still take other damage.
Banish target to another plane; native of other plane doesn't return after 1 min.
Plants have disadvantage on save and take max DAM.
Targets can't take reactions and do random actions.  See Sourcebook.
Teleport yourself and ally to location. If occupied/ 4d6 force DAM and spell fails.
Charm beast to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.
Become invisible until spell ends.

column10: pinch of dust/ drop of water
column18: Storm's area of effect becomes difficult terrain until end of next turn.
Transform creature's form. All stats change. Limited to actions of new form.
Target gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning/ piercing/ and slashing DMG.
Those entering or ending turn on one side of the wall take 5d8 fire DAM.
Animate objects to accept simple commands.
DAM taken on entering or starting turn in area. Fog moves away 10 ft. per turn.
Creatures killed become frozen statues.

column10: bit of matter you want to make
column18: Make nonliving object no larger than 5 ft. cube.  See Sourcebook.
Charm humanoid to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.
Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn. Doesn't work on undead.

column10: bit of sugar/ grain/ and fat
column18: Targets make save when swarm created or entering or exiting it.
Disguise willing or unwillig creatures as other similar creatures/ including outfits.
Move objects or creatures with your mind.  See Sourcebook.
Any stepping inside circle teleport to permanent teleportation circle.
Create wall of stone or other stone structure.  See Sourcebook.
Create two linked portals 10ft. across anybody can travel between.
Bolt hits one target then forks to up to 3 others.
If target drops to 0 HP/ is disintegrated. Only revived by True Resurrection.
Affect targets negatively.  New target each turn.  See Sourcebook.
Spells <= 5th level cannot affect those within the globe.
Make creatures accept reasonable sounding suggestions. See Sourcebook.
Reshape dirt/ sand/ or clay. Can move to different square after 10 minutes.
Creatures are blinded until your next turn. Use your action to make a new line.
Target creature gains truesight/ sees secret doors/ Ethereal Plane. Range 120 ft.

column10: tiny ball of guano and sulfur
column18: Creates spot where fireball will erupt.  See Sourcebook.
Become ethereal.  Move up/down at half speed.  Can't see past 60 ft.
Humanoids killed rise as a zombie next turn permanently under your control.
Transport to another plane. You specify general location or teleportation circle.
Send a rainbow of negative effects at enemies.  See Sourcebook.
Creatures fall upwards/ taking falling damage. Fall again once spell ends.
Teleport yourself and willing creatures to a distant location.  See Sourcebook.
Charm monster to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.

column10: piece of dirt/ rock/ and clay
column18: Create a seismic disturbance with various effects.  See Sourcebook.
Targets make save when cloud created or entering or exiting it. Cloud move: 10ft.
Target <= 150 HP is stunned. Nothing otherwise. CON save at end of turn to end.
Creatures are blinded for 1 minute (CON save at end of turn to end).
Create portal to precise location on another plane or near a specific person.
Also damages objects and ignites flammable objects.
If target has <= 100 HP/ it dies instantly. No effect otherwise. No saving throw.
Stop time. Take 1d4+1 turns alone. Spell ends if you affect others in any way.
